scripts.postman:test: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('postman-reports',{recursive:true});" && newman run "node_modules/Rails API Tests.postman_collection.json" -e "node_modules/rails local.postman_environment.json" -r json,html --reporter-json-export "postman-reports/report.json" --reporter-html-export "postman-reports/report.html"
